Hi,
i want to post a little idea. First of all sorry for my english, and 
i'm a beginner in AI so this would be a stupid idea. :)
Our brain grow in the first 3 years and after begin to decrease 
eliminating everything (connections and neurons) which are not used, 
isn't true?
so if I understand NEAT it's evolve considering also a smallest 
structure if it fitness than the other...
but when we reach the task we could have a great topology...
should be or not usefull implements a way in which the program try 
only to eliminate part of the structure?
it will be a "NEAT reverse" trying to preserve the fitness...
